The Lord showed me some weeks ago that as James would begin to republish what the leaders had written in '44 upon the truth, Satan would try to hinder us; but we must struggle for the victory and go on. It has been just so. He knows this work will hurt His cause and save some jewels. That is why he rages so but he is driven back.--Letter 12, 1850, p. 2. (To Brother and Sister Howland, August 15, 1850.) 


                                    -250-
